name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  In the course of practicing such skills, we will follow from our reading class and take as our general theme good and evil, as we develop descriptive and analytic paragraphs in response to the readings and films.
